parsermigration-pref-help: This adds a sidebar link giving access to [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:ParserMigration a tool] for migrating page text to new versions of the MediaWiki parser.
parsermigration-parsoid-readviews-select: Use the new Parsoid wikitext parser:
When Parsoid is used, a sidebar link will be provided to allow using the legacy parser in case of issues.
parsermigration-report-bug-toolbox-title:
If you see display errors,
it may be due to Parsoid
parsermigration-notice-body: You are using the new Parsoid wikitext parser to display this page. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Parsoid/Parser_Unification/Migration Learn more about this feature].
parsermigration-reportbug-dialog-complet: Your feedback has been posted on the [$2 $1] page.
parsermigration-reportbug-dialog-desc: This page was rendered with [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Parsoid|Parsoid]], which may be the reason for some display errors
parsermigration-reportbug-dialog-destina: Your feedback will be added to the [$2 $1] page, along with your username.
parsermigration-reportbug-dialog-placeho: Describe the visual bug you are seeing
parsermigration-feedback-error4: Error: Unable to post to given feedback title
parsermigration-survey-privacy-policy: Survey provided by Wikimedia Foundation. Please read our [//foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Legal:Parsoid_Opt-Out_Survey_Privacy_Statement privacy statement].
parsermigration-survey-confirm-msg: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us regarding Parsoid! We really appreciate your time!
parsermigration-survey-description: As we roll out technical improvements to {{SITENAME}}, we noticed you have opted out of these technical improvements. Please help us understand your experience!
parsermigration-survey-question-1: What best describes your current relationship with Parsoid? (select one)
parsermigration-survey-question-1-answer: I'm aware of it and like it
I've heard of it but haven't tried it
I tried it but stopped using it
I would like to use the legacy parser as long as possible
parsermigration-survey-question-2: If you're not currently using Parsoid, what are the main reasons? (select all that apply)
parsermigration-survey-question-2-answer: Lack of awareness / don't know what it offers
Compatibility concerns with existing templates, extensions, or gadgets
Haven't had time to evaluate it
Waiting for it to become the default
parsermigration-survey-question-3: What would help you adopt Parsoid? (select all that apply)
parsermigration-survey-question-3-answer: Nothing â€” I plan to wait for automatic migration
parsermigration-survey-question-4: Do you have any additional thoughts or concerns about Parsoid?
tag-parsermigration-visual-bug-descripti: A report of a visual bug created using the [[mw:Extension:ParserMigration|ParserMigration extension]]
